title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS RTB Fabric: Real-time bidding workloads with your AdTech partners (IND379)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS RTB Fabric: 与您的广告技术合作伙伴进行实时竞价工作负载 (IND379)
abstract: Advertising technology (AdTech) companies buy, serve, and measure hundreds of billions of ads per day at single-digit millisecond latency. Explore how AWS RTB Fabric transforms real-time bidding workloads with an optimized, private network in the cloud. Industry leaders from Yahoo and Yieldmo share how they reduce costs, optimize development velocity, and improve performance for scaled real-time bidding workloads using AWS RTB Fabric. Hear AdTech experts share cloud-native best practices, architectures, and pitfalls to avoid when scaling ad platforms. Learn how AWS RTB Fabric can help you save up to 80% compared to standard cloud networking costs—without the need for upfront commitments.
abstract_cn: 广告技术（AdTech）公司每天以个位数毫秒级延迟购买、投放和衡量数千亿次广告。探索 AWS RTB Fabric 如何通过云中优化的私有网络转变实时竞价工作负载。来自 Yahoo 和 Yieldmo 的行业领导者分享他们如何使用 AWS RTB Fabric 降低成本、优化开发速度并提高大规模实时竞价工作负载的性能。聆听 AdTech 专家分享云原生最佳实践、架构以及在扩展广告平台时应避免的陷阱。了解 AWS RTB Fabric 如何帮助您与标准云网络成本相比节省高达 80% 的费用——无需预付承诺。
